Typography

Use the button classes on and <a>, <button>, <input> elements.

a.button.star {
  background-color: gold; }

a.button.star.star-given {
    outline: 1px solid; }

a.button.star.disabled {
    opacity: 0.25; }

  font-size: 100%;
  line-height: 1.5; }
